about_the_game:
Have you been trying to give each of your rich noble’s mansions their own look, but ran into the problem of giving them all the same furniture and walls? Then A Touch of Opulence Tileset is made for you! Aqua is here with a variety of MV-sized plush rugs, detailed wallpapers, and carefully crafted couches to turn your boring noblewomans’ living rooms and princess’ bedrooms into gorgeous interiors that will be the talk of the town.

This pack’s 1 A2, 4 A4, and 3 B sheets are filled with everything you need to add some extra grandeur to sitting rooms, kitchens, studies, bedrooms, and even bathrooms! This pack also includes extra A4 and B sheets to help you make each room perfect.

Pick up A Touch of Opulence Tileset and fill every mansion with beautiful furniture and decorations!


Contents:

* an assortment of interior accents such as:
* luxurious couches and chairs
* tables
* wall decorations
* arched windows and doors
* wallpapers
* flooring
* and more!


Included within this pack:

* Inside_A2
* Inside_A4
* Inside_B
* Inside_C
* Inside_D
